languages.text: "По твоему тону я решила, что меня ждет дознание, а не вечер при свечах".

traits.locale_text: "По твоему тону я решила, что меня ждет дознание, а не вечер при свечах".

languages.text: "Based on your tone, I thought I was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."
languages.original_text: "По твоему тону я решила, что меня ждет дознание, а не вечер при свечах".

traits.locale_text: "Based on your tone, I thought was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."
"Based on your tone, I thought was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."
"Based on your tone, I thought was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."
"Based on your tone, I thought was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."

languages.text: “你刚刚的语气，让我以为你打算审讯我，而不是邀请我共进烛光晚餐。”
languages.original_text: "Based on your tone, I thought I was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."

traits.locale_text: “你刚刚的语气，让我以为你打算审讯我，而不是邀请我共进烛光晚餐。”

languages.text: «A juzgar por su tono, pensaba que me esperaba un interrogatorio y no una cena con velas».
languages.original_text: "Based on your tone, I thought I was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."

traits.locale_text: «A juzgar por su tono, pensaba que me esperaba un interrogatorio y no una cena con velas».

languages.text: 「口調のせいで、暖かなディナーではなく尋問でも受けるのかと思ったよ」
languages.original_text: "Based on your tone, I thought I was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."

traits.locale_text: 「口調のせいで、暖かなディナーではなく尋問でも受けるのかと思ったよ」

languages.text: « D'après le ton de votre invitation, je m'attendais à un interrogatoire, pas à un dîner aux chandelles. »
languages.original_text: "Based on your tone, I thought I was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."

traits.locale_text: « D'après le ton de votre invitation, je m'attendais à un interrogatoire, pas à un dîner aux chandelles. »

languages.text: "Eurem Tonfall nach zu urteilen, dachte ich, mir würde ein Verhör und kein Abendessen bei Kerzenschein bevorstehen."
languages.original_text: "Based on your tone, I thought I was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."

traits.locale_text: "Eurem Tonfall nach zu urteilen, dachte ich, mir würde ein Verhör und kein Abendessen bei Kerzenschein bevorstehen."

languages.text: "Ses tonuna bakınca mum ışığında bir akşam yemeğinden ziyade sorguya çekildiğimi sanmıştım."
languages.original_text: "Based on your tone, I thought I was in for an interrogation, not a candlelit dinner."
